table_caption: A summary of findings of studies on DTI.
table_foot: Abbreviations: AD, axial diffusivity; APOE e4, apolipoprotein e4; BMI, body mass index; DTI, diffusion tensor imaging; FA, fractional anisotropy; gFA, general factors for FA; gMD, general factors for MD; MD, mean diffusivity; RD, radial diffusivity; ROI, region of interest; WM, white matter; WMH, white matter hyperintensities.
